page.title: 20THE DOMESDAY SURVEY
page.content: This area which covers Kings Norton, Druids Heath and the Hawkesly and Poole Farm estates shows a contrast between a historic village green, modern housing estates and the rolling pasture lands of the farms in Worcestershire. The last few years has seen the building of the Hollywood by-pass a major dual carriageway which cuts through the heart of the farmland.There were 6 Primary Schools taking part in this survey. They are{Bells Farm} Primary School, {Broadmeadow Junior} School, {Kings Norton} Primary School, {St.Pauls} R.C.Primary School, {Hawkesley} Church of England Junior School, and {Sir Theodore Pritchett} Primary School.
